title: WPS Connect 1.3.2 APK #Networks #Tools
text:
Downloads 
1.2 M WPS Connect is an app to try to connect to WiFi networks with WPS protocol enabled â€“ though always with the permission of the network owner, of course. The aim of WPS Connect is to check if the specific router is vulnerable to a PIN by default. Many routers installed by internet service providers have vulnerabilities. With this app, you can check if your own router is vulnerable and change the password accordingly. It's very important to keep in mind that in order to use WPS Connect, you need a rooted device. WPS Connect is a very useful tool for checking if your router's password is completely secure ... though it obviously also has other uses. Requirements 
Requires Android 4.0 or higher Opinions about WPS Connect No opinions about WPS Connect . Be the first! Comment
